item.description:
RI
Exeter Oct 7 (Sun)
2012

Dance Â  Lil BeeDee & Doo-Rites (MA R&B,Rockabilly) 5:00PM - 6:30PM
Li'l BeeDee & the Doo-Rites @ Bishop's Castle -- 3 band mini-fest at Austin Farm! 2pm to 8pm or so, with Daphne Lee Martin and Raise the Rent kicking off the day, followed by the Doo-Rites, and the Hoolios finish up. Great barn dance & potluck! Suggested donation to cover the day: $20. Address: 199 Austin Farm Rd.,Exeter, RI
Bishop's Castle, 199 Austin Farm Road, Exeter, RI 02822-1602 Barn, Large Wood Dance Floor
Suggested Donation, 5:00PM to 6:30PM, Potluck dinner at 2:00PM bring food to share Info: (401) 392-0212
item.how_to_find_us: CELL PHONE 401-225-6859 there will not be a meetup sign.. Call my cell before 2pm so I can tell you were to meet me.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Zydeco bands, dancing, and Pot Luck, BYOB.
